ygData.subject: RE: [shadowknight] Bronze
ygData.msgSnippet: Man, unrest is prime hunting for a SK, and there are drybones strewed about the place. Please not has been least 6 months since ive been, there, and
ygData.messageBody:
<snip>
Man, unrest is prime hunting for a SK, and there are drybones strewed about
the place. Please not has been least 6 months since ive been, there, and
armor drops may have changed. But, Dry bones are anywhere in the house, and
they used to drop small bronze...
<snip>


Obviously I have srtuck a nerve.... my appologies.
I may not have been entirely clear with why I am being so inquisitive about
armor and such. Lasombra is 1st level and sitting on a log in Nektulos
Forrest. He has not been to the guild trainer, nor has he attacked anything
yet. He has turned in his guild note though. ;-)

My current primary character (26th level Druid) is going to twink Lasombra
with what I can find. Since I had (until you were kind enough to help me) no
clue where to find small bronze armor, I continued to narrow the location
from "Unrest" to a smaller area. Like "the main floor back door entry has 4
mobs that should have it". Since it appears that Drybone skeletons are the
primary MoBs that have Small Bronze, I will be checking out 3 places as my
Druid; Lake Rathetear, Befallen and Unrest. If this assumption is wrong, let
me know.

I don't want to waste time wandering Norrath auctioning for small bronze, or
attacking the wrong MoBs looking for it, as I want Lasombra to become my
Primary character as fast as I can. Now I have specific locations to go and
auction and/or hunt for it. That was my goal, it has been achieved. Thank
you for your patience.


I plan on being very vocal and asking alot of questions. I want my SK to do
well, and this is the best place to get the advise I am seeking. Future
topics include: weapons, tactics, faction, and quests.

When I was my TSK, Xilth(sp?) and Beld were my source of knowledge, and I am
happy to see Beld out of his 30s and almost 50 (lets you know how long ago
that was. heh.). Congrats to you, you deserve it. Countess Bathory still
here as well?

Look for many more exciting emails from my corner.


--
Lasombra
1st Tier of Hate
Bertoxx
